reviews.review: 小时候网吧都在玩，FPS游戏的启蒙作！现在入正了！支持一下！
Very good game. If you don't have it you should buy a copy of it.
This is better than CS GO. No skin, no cases. :P

Com certeza um dos melhores modos de jogo para muita gente. Ao contrário do que as pessoas falam hoje em dia, que o CS 1.6 (Counter Strike) morreu, é mentira: ele continua de pé. Claro, não é um enxame de pessoas que ainda jogam, mas é muita gente ainda sim.


CS RAIZ

永远的反恐精英，永远的FPS！
玩了这么多年盗版，入正补票！
这是十年的青春，十年的梦想，反恐精英这么多年了一直都是FPS游戏无法撼动的经典，我喜欢反恐精英的系列游戏！

Counter Strike - появился благодоря Half-life и уже давно стал отдельным продуктом, который прочно засел в наших сердцах! Версия 1.6 является old-school и даже сегодня у пользователей вызывает ностальгию. Лично для меня CS 1.6, без преувеличения, является одной из самый любимых игр, в которые я могу играть часами и сутками напролёт.
Uno de los mejores juegos de la historia. Mi juego favorito
Gekauft, etwas gespielt und direkt Geld zurück angefordert - nicht meins
осторожно очень затягивает сел играть в 9 лет досих пор не могу пройти эту игру даже на 50 процентов

O que dizer desse clássico que impulsionou o gênero FPS no mundo? 

BOOM HEADSHOT
9 senedir zevkle oynadığım fps oyunu herkeze tavsiye ederim
Как играть??? После CS:GO тут крайне сложно привыкнуть к другой стрельбе и механике...
Покупалась в составе "Counter-Strike Complete - Aug 2012" 05.01.2013 г. за 199 р..

Безусловно эта игра легенда как 2000-х годов, так и нынешних. Все киберспортсмены тренировали скилл и тренируют его именно здесь. 250 рублей не такая уж и огромная сумма.   Хотите натренировать скилл- вам сюда.

Великолепная игра!
Классика жанра и просто лучший шутер на все времена.
This game is waaaay better than CS:GO
juego muy bueno a pesar de los año es un gran juego y entretenido

It's pure Nastolgia.
Can you remember the times as you was starting Half-Life before playing CS as a MOD?
Or (auto)-bunnyhopping by holding the space button?
Or the similar buymenu for Ts and CTs? (4.1 AK-47 ... 4.3 Colt M4 ... 4.5 Schmidt ...)

Counter-Strike has already its 20th anniversary now in 2019.
If it would be a person, then it could drive a car or drink alcohol (OK not in USA, but in one year).

This game is just an icon!

As a person who plays a lot of CS:GO, I wasn't expecting this to be as good. It's the exact level of fun as the other Counter-Strike games. It still amazes me that people actually play this game. You don't have to be good to play CS 1.6, it's just a really fun game.

Играю в неё года 3 -4 оч классно советую всем
Adorei o jogo dá muita pica para jogar kkk
Counter-Strike, sem dúvida o FPS que ira marcar a vida de muitos. Com certeza boa parte começou nas lan houses e hoje faz o game ser um historia maguinifica.
My first FPS game and I still love it.
jogo ate hoje, classico dos classicos...
get a magazine and get a glue then stick it up with the book then place the book on the table and then congrats ! now you have a mousebook 10/10

I look at this game as a history piece. I don't think the gameplay has aged well, I don't think the engine has aged well, but it's interesting seeing the roots of Counter-Strike from way back. It's not unplayable, but I think Quake III and UT have aged better. But if you're at all interested in the history of famous FPS games, this is something you should check out.
CS is fast paced, intense, and satisfying, this game will not disappoint. This is truly one of the best mods for one of the all time greatest first person shooters ever.
Simplesmente o melhor jogo para vcs jogar com seus amigos, e online.
Para mi gusto el mejor de la saga de Counter Strike,muy divertido para estar con amigos en un cyber y pasar el rato 100% recomendado
Never gets old. It may be an old game, but to me it never gets old. I enjoy playing it more than these new games like DOTA 2 or maybe GTA V. Shit will never get fucking old, I swear.
Hraju to dost dlouho a furt baví <3

2000 saat CSGO oynamış biri olarak hilelerden bıktım ve cs 1.6 aldım oyun gayet iyi hile falan yok eski bi oyun olmasına rağmen CSGO dan sıklmış biri olarak ara sıra gelir oynarım.18 lirayı en iyi değerlendirebileceğiniz oyunlardan biri eğer atıyom csgoda skin sevmiyosunuz ve oyundan pahalı bir skin düştü. (benim gibi bıçağım var ama kullanmıyorum)Satın gelin bu oyunu alın
